                  abs PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  da02              BGE      |L1.10|
000004  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
000008  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.10|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4770              BX       lr
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  clr_scrn PROC
;;;18     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;19     void clr_scrn(void)
00000c  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;20     {
;;;21     char i;
;;;22     for (i=0;i<LCD_SIZE;i++)
;;;23     	{
;;;24     	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';

                  |L1.22|

00001c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;22
00001e  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8              ;22
000020  d3f9              BCC      |L1.22|
;;;25     	}
;;;26     }
000022  4770              BX       lr
;;;27     
                          ENDP

                  find PROC
;;;28     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;29     char find(char xy)
000024  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;30     {
;;;31     char i=0;
000026  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;32     do i++;
;;;33     while ((lcd_buffer[i]!=xy)&&(i<LCD_SIZE));
00002a  4af6              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.44|
00002c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;32
000030  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;32
000032  5c13              LDRB     r3,[r2,r0]

000036  d001              BEQ      |L1.60|
000038  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8
00003a  d3f7              BCC      |L1.44|
                  |L1.60|
;;;34     //if(i==(LCD_SIZE)) i++;
;;;35     return i;
;;;36     }
00003c  4770              BX       lr
;;;37     
                          ENDP

                  bin2bcd_int PROC
;;;39     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;40     void bin2bcd_int(unsigned int in)
00003e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;41     {
;;;42     
;;;43     char i=5;
;;;44     for(i=0;i<5;i++)

;;;45     	{
;;;46     	dig[i]=in%10;

                  |L1.74|

000054  5463              STRB     r3,[r4,r1]

;;;47     	in/=10;
;;;48     	}   
;;;49     }
000060  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;50     //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  bcd2lcd_zero PROC
;;;51     void bcd2lcd_zero(char sig)
000062  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;52     {
;;;53     char i;
;;;54     zero_on=1;
000064  4de9              LDR      r5,|L1.1036|
000066  f04f0101          MOV      r1,#1
00006a  7029              STRB     r1,[r5,#0]
;;;55     for (i=5;i>0;i--)
00006c  f04f0105          MOV      r1,#5
;;;56     	{
;;;57     	if(zero_on&&(!dig[i-1])&&(i>sig))
000070  4be5              LDR      r3,|L1.1032|
;;;58     		{
;;;59     		dig[i-1]=0x20;
000072  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
000076  f04f0700          MOV      r7,#0                 ;54
                  |L1.122|
00007a  782a              LDRB     r2,[r5,#0]            ;57  ; zero_on
00007c  b142              CBZ      r2,|L1.144|
00007e  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1              ;57
000080  f8124c01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]           ;57
000084  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.144|
000086  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;57
000088  d902              BLS      |L1.144|
00008a  f8026c01          STRB     r6,[r2,#-1]
00008e  e007              B        |L1.160|
                  |L1.144|
;;;60     		}
;;;61     	else
;;;62     		{
;;;63     		dig[i-1]=dig[i-1]+0x30;
000090  eb030201          ADD      r2,r3,r1
000094  f8124d01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]!
000098  f1040430          ADD      r4,r4,#0x30
00009c  7014              STRB     r4,[r2,#0]
;;;64     		zero_on=0;
00009e  702f              STRB     r7,[r5,#0]
                  |L1.160|
0000a0  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1              ;55
0000a4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;55
0000a6  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;55
0000a8  d1e7              BNE      |L1.122|
;;;65     		}	
;;;66     	}
;;;67     }             
0000aa  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;68     
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;151    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;152    void int2lcd_mmm(signed short in,char xy,char des)
0000ac  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
;;;153    {
0000ae  4603              MOV      r3,r0
;;;154    signed char i;
;;;155    char n;
;;;156    char s[10];
;;;157    char minus='+';

;;;158    char zero_on;
;;;159    char simb_num;
;;;160    
;;;161    if(in<0)

;;;162    	{
;;;163    	in=-in;

;;;165    	}
;;;166    
;;;167    for(i=0;i<10;i++)

;;;168    	{

;;;170    	in/=10;

0000dc  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;167
0000de  280a              CMP      r0,#0xa               ;167

;;;171    	}   
;;;172    
;;;173    zero_on=1;

;;;174    simb_num=0;

;;;175    
;;;176    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)
0000ea  f04f0009          MOV      r0,#9
;;;177    	{
;;;178    	if(zero_on&&(!s[i])&&(i>(des)))
;;;179    	     {
;;;180    	     s[i]=0x20;

                  |L1.242|

0000f8  f1bc0f00          CMP      r12,#0                ;178
0000fc  d103              BNE      |L1.262|
0000fe  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;178
000100  dd01              BLE      |L1.262|
000102  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
000104  e008              B        |L1.280|
                  |L1.262|
;;;181    	     }
;;;182    	else 
;;;183    	     {
;;;184    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

000108  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30
00010c  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;185    	     zero_on=0;
00010e  f04f0300          MOV      r3,#0
;;;186    	     simb_num++;

000116  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.280|
000118  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;176
00011c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;176
00011e  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;176
000120  dae7              BGE      |L1.242|
;;;187    	     }
;;;188    	 }
;;;189    	          
;;;190    if(minus=='-')	
000122  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
000124  d104              BNE      |L1.304|
;;;191         {
;;;192         s[simb_num++]=minus; 
000126  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000128  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
00012c  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
00012e  542f              STRB     r7,[r5,r0]
                  |L1.304|
;;;193         }    
;;;194    if(des)
000130  b18a              CBZ      r2,|L1.342|
;;;195         {
;;;196         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
000132  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
000134  e007              B        |L1.326|
                  |L1.310|
;;;197              {
;;;198              s[i]=s[i-1];

00013a  f8133c01          LDRB     r3,[r3,#-1]
00013e  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
000140  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;196
000144  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;196
                  |L1.326|
000146  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;196
000148  dcf5              BGT      |L1.310|
;;;199              }
;;;200         s[des]='.';
00014a  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
00014e  54a8              STRB     r0,[r5,r2]
;;;201         simb_num++;     
000150  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
000154  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.342|
;;;202         }
;;;203    	
;;;204    n=find(xy);
000156  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000158  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;205    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
00015c  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;206    	{
;;;207         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];

000162  e006              B        |L1.370|
                  |L1.356|
000164  eba00601          SUB      r6,r0,r1
000168  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00016a  5593              STRB     r3,[r2,r6]
00016c  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;205
000170  b249              SXTB     r1,r1                 ;205
                  |L1.370|

000174  dbf6              BLT      |L1.356|
;;;208    	}
;;;209    }
000176  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;210    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcd_mmm PROC

;;;280    void long2lcd_mmm(signed long in,char xy,char des)

;;;281    {

;;;307    	     {

0001cc  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
0001ce  e008              B        |L1.482|
                  |L1.464|
;;;309    	     }
;;;310    	else 
;;;311    	     {
;;;312    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

0001d2  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30
0001d6  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;313    	     zero_on=0;
0001d8  f04f0300          MOV      r3,#0
;;;314    	     simb_num++;

                  |L1.482|

;;;315    	     }
;;;316    	 }
;;;317    	          
;;;318    if(minus=='-')	
0001ec  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
0001ee  d104              BNE      |L1.506|
;;;319         {
;;;320         s[simb_num++]=minus;

0001f6  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4

;;;327              }
;;;328         s[des]='.';

;;;329         simb_num++;

                  |L1.544|
;;;330         }
;;;331    	
;;;332    n=find(xy);

;;;333    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)

;;;334    	{

;;;336    	}
;;;337    }

                  long2lcdyx_mmm PROC
;;;416    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;417    void long2lcdyx_mmm(signed long in,char y,char x,char des)

;;;418    {
;;;419    signed char i;

;;;458         }    
;;;459    if(des)
0002c8  b18b              CBZ      r3,|L1.750|
;;;460         {
;;;461         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
0002ca  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
0002cc  e007              B        |L1.734|
                  |L1.718|
;;;462              {
;;;463              s[i]=s[i-1];
0002ce  eb070500          ADD      r5,r7,r0
0002d2  f8155c01          LDRB     r5,[r5,#-1]
0002d6  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
0002d8  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;461
0002dc  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;461
                  |L1.734|
0002de  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;461
0002e0  dcf5              BGT      |L1.718|
;;;464              }
;;;465         s[des]='.';
0002e2  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
0002e6  54f8              STRB     r0,[r7,r3]
;;;466         simb_num++;     
0002e8  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0002ec  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.750|
;;;467         }
;;;468    	
;;;469    n=(20*y)+x;
0002ee  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0002f2  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0002f6  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;470    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
0002f8  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;471    	{
;;;472         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
0002fc  4a41              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
0002fe  e006              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.768|
000300  eba10500          SUB      r5,r1,r0
000304  5c3b              LDRB     r3,[r7,r0]
000306  5553              STRB     r3,[r2,r5]
000308  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;470
00030c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;470
                  |L1.782|
00030e  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;470
000310  dbf6              BLT      |L1.768|
;;;473    	}
;;;474    
;;;475    
;;;476    
;;;477    }
000312  e8bd81fe          POP      {r1-r8,pc}
;;;478    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdyx PROC
;;;479    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;480    void int2lcdyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x,char des)
000316  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;481    {
000318  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00031a  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00031c  461c              MOV      r4,r3
;;;482    char i;
;;;483    char n;
;;;484    bin2bcd_int(in);
00031e  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;485    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
000322  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000324  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000326  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;486    i=(y*20)+x;
00032a  eb050085          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSL #2
00032e  eb060080          ADD      r0,r6,r0,LSL #2
000332  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;487    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
000334  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;488    	{ 
;;;489    	if(n<des)
;;;490    		{
;;;491    		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000338  4b33              LDR      r3,|L1.1032|
00033a  4d32              LDR      r5,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.828|
00033c  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;489
00033e  d201              BCS      |L1.836|
000340  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000342  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.836|
;;;492    		}   
;;;493    	if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
000344  d307              BCC      |L1.854|
000346  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000348  2a20              CMP      r2,#0x20
00034a  d004              BEQ      |L1.854|
;;;494    		{
;;;495    		if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
00034c  b164              CBZ      r4,|L1.872|
;;;496    		else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
00034e  eb050601          ADD      r6,r5,r1
000352  f8062c01          STRB     r2,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.854|
;;;497       		}   
;;;498    	i--;	
000356  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00035a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00035c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;487
000360  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;487
000362  2805              CMP      r0,#5                 ;487
000364  d3ea              BCC      |L1.828|
;;;499    	}
;;;500    }
000366  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.872|
000368  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]            ;495
00036a  e7f4              B        |L1.854|
;;;501    
                          ENDP

                  sub_bgnd PROC
;;;1741   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1742   void sub_bgnd(char const *adr,char xy,signed char offset)
00036c  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1743   {
00036e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000370  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000372  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;1744   char temp;
;;;1745   temp=find(xy);
000374  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1746   
;;;1747   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1748   if(temp!=255)
000378  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
00037a  d00c              BEQ      |L1.918|
;;;1749   while (*adr)
;;;1750   	{
;;;1751   	lcd_buffer[temp+offset]=*adr++;
00037c  4a21              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
;;;1752   	temp++;
00037e  e007              B        |L1.912|
                  |L1.896|
000380  eb000305          ADD      r3,r0,r5              ;1751
000384  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1              ;1751
000388  54d1              STRB     r1,[r2,r3]            ;1751
00038a  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
00038e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.912|
000390  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1749
000392  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1749
000394  d1f4              BNE      |L1.896|
                  |L1.918|
;;;1753       	}
;;;1754   }
000396  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1755   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd PROC
;;;1545   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1546   void int2lcd(unsigned short in,char xy,char des)
000398  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1547   {
00039a  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00039c  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;1548   char i;
;;;1549   char n;
;;;1550   
;;;1551   bin2bcd_int(in);
00039e  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;1552   bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
0003a2  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
0003a4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0003a6  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;1553   i=find(xy);
0003aa  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0003ac  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1554   for (n=0;n<5;n++)
0003b0  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;1555   	{
;;;1556      	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
0003b4  4a14              LDR      r2,|L1.1032|
;;;1557      		{
;;;1558      		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
0003b6  4d13              LDR      r5,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.952|
0003b8  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.964|
0003ba  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]            ;1556
0003bc  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20              ;1556
0003be  d001              BEQ      |L1.964|
0003c0  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0003c2  e015              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.964|
;;;1559      		}
;;;1560      	else 
;;;1561      		{
;;;1562      		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
0003c4  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
0003c6  d202              BCS      |L1.974|
0003c8  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003ca  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0003cc  e010              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.974|
;;;1563      		else if (n==des)
0003ce  d108              BNE      |L1.994|
;;;1564      			{
;;;1565      			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
0003d0  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
0003d4  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;1566      			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0003d6  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
0003da  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003dc  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
0003e0  e006              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.994|
;;;1567      			} 
;;;1568      		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];   		
0003e2  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003e4  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
0003e6  d003              BEQ      |L1.1008|
0003e8  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
0003ec  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.1008|
;;;1569      		}  
;;;1570   		
;;;1571   	i--;	
0003f0  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
0003f4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0003f6  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;1554
0003fa  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1554
0003fc  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;1554
0003fe  d3db              BCC      |L1.952|
;;;1572   	}
;;;1573   }
000400  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
000402  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.1028|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.1032|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L1.1036|
                          DCD      zero_on
                          ENDP

                  ptr_carry PROC
;;;1783   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1784   char ptr_carry(signed int in,unsigned char modul,signed int carry)
000410  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
;;;1785   {
;;;1786   signed int tempSI;
;;;1787   tempSI=in;                                                             
;;;1788   tempSI+=carry;
;;;1789   if(tempSI<0)tempSI+=modul;
000412  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000414  da01              BGE      |L1.1050|
000416  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
000418  e003              B        |L1.1058|
                  |L1.1050|
;;;1790   else if(tempSI>=modul)tempSI-=modul;
00041a  4288              CMP      r0,r1
00041c  db01              BLT      |L1.1058|
00041e  eba00001          SUB      r0,r0,r1
                  |L1.1058|
;;;1791   
;;;1792   return (char)tempSI;
000422  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1793   }
000424  4770              BX       lr
;;;1794   
                          ENDP

                  event2ind PROC
;;;503    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;504    void event2ind(char num, char simbol)
000426  e92d4ffe          PUSH     {r1-r11,lr}
;;;505    {
00042a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00042c  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;506    char iii;
;;;507    char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;508    unsigned int tempii;    
;;;509    		
;;;510    tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
00042e  f44f6060          MOV      r0,#0xe00
000432  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
;;;511    tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));
000436  4262              RSBS     r2,r4,#0
000438  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00043a  f7fffffe          BL       ptr_carry
;;;512    tempii*=32;
00043e  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;513    tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
000442  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
000446  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;514         
;;;515    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
000448  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
00044a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00044c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;516    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
000450  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000452  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
000456  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;517    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
00045a  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00045c  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
000460  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;518    
;;;519    iii=find(simbol);
000464  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000466  f7fffffe          BL       find
00046a  4682              MOV      r10,r0
;;;520         
;;;521    if(dt[0]=='U')
00046c  f89d0008          LDRB     r0,[sp,#8]
;;;522        { 
;;;523        if(dt[2]=='R')
;;;524       		{
;;;525        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';
000470  f8dfb720          LDR      r11,|L1.2964|
;;;526       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ê';
;;;527        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='ë';
;;;528       		}
;;;529        	
;;;530    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;531    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;532       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;533       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;534    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;535       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;536    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;537       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;538    //	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;539        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
000474  f8df9720          LDR      r9,|L1.2968|
000478  f04f0740          MOV      r7,#0x40              ;511
;;;540        	{
;;;541        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00047c  f04f0630          MOV      r6,#0x30
;;;542         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
000480  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
;;;543         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;544         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;545         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;546         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;547         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;548         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
000484  f04f0523          MOV      r5,#0x23
000488  f04f0420          MOV      r4,#0x20              ;530
00048c  2855              CMP      r0,#0x55              ;521
00048e  d07e              BEQ      |L1.1422|
;;;549         	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;550         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;551         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;552         	}	                   
;;;553    	else      	
;;;554            {
;;;555     		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;556         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;557         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;558         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;559         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;560         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;561         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;562         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;563         	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;564         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;565         	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;566    		sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;567      		}	   
;;;568         }   
;;;569         
;;;570    else if(dt[0]=='P')
;;;571    	{
;;;572      	lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;573        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;574        lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;575        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ï';
000490  21cf              MOVS     r1,#0xcf
;;;576        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ñ';
000492  f04f0cd1          MOV      r12,#0xd1
000496  2850              CMP      r0,#0x50              ;570
000498  d07a              BEQ      |L1.1424|
;;;577    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;578        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;579    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;580        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;581    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;582        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;583    	//lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;584         	
;;;585        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;586         	{
;;;587             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;588         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;589        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;590        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;591        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;592         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;593         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;594         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;595             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;596         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;597         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;598         	}	                   
;;;599        	else      	
;;;600         	{
;;;601          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;602         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;603         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;604         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;605          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;606          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;607          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;608          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;609          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;610         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;611          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;612    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;613      		}     	
;;;614         }   
;;;615    
;;;616    else if(dt[0]=='Q')
;;;617    	{
;;;618      	lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;619        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;620        lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;621        lcd_buffer[iii++]='U';
;;;622        lcd_buffer[iii++]='â';
00049a  22e2              MOVS     r2,#0xe2
00049c  2851              CMP      r0,#0x51              ;616
00049e  d078              BEQ      |L1.1426|
;;;623    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='û';
;;;624        lcd_buffer[iii++]='õ';
;;;625    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;626    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;627    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;628    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;629    		     	
;;;630        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;631         	{
;;;632             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;633         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;634        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;635        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;636        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;637         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;638         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;639         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;640             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;641         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;642         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;643         	}	                   
;;;644        	else      	
;;;645         	{
;;;646          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;647         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;648         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;649         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;650          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;651          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;652          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;653          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;654          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;655         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;656          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;657    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;658      		}     	
;;;659         }   
;;;660    
;;;661    else if(dt[0]=='B')
0004a0  2842              CMP      r0,#0x42
0004a2  d077              BEQ      |L1.1428|
;;;662        	{
;;;663        	if(dt[2]=='C')
;;;664        		{
;;;665      			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;666        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;667        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;668        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;669        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;670        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';
;;;671    			lcd_buffer[iii++]='N';
;;;672    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;673        			{
;;;674        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;675        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;676        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;677        			}
;;;678        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;679        			{
;;;680        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;681        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;682        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;683        			}
;;;684        		else 
;;;685        			{
;;;686        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;687        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;688        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;689        			} 
;;;690        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;691         	
;;;692        		if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;693        			{
;;;694        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;695       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;696        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;697        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;698        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;699       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;700       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;701       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;702       	 	    	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;703       	 		int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;704       	 		int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;705        			}	                   
;;;706        		else      	
;;;707        			{
;;;708        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;709        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;710        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;711        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;712        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;713        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;714        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;715        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;716        			int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;717        			int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;718        	    		if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;719    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;720        			}
;;;721        		}
;;;722    
;;;723        	if(dt[2]=='S')
;;;724        		{
;;;725      			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;726        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;727        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;728        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;729        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;730        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';

;;;732        			{

;;;1135   else if(dt[0]=='s')
;;;1136       {
;;;1137       if(dt[2]=='Z')

;;;1139     		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ó';

;;;1140       	lcd_buffer[iii++]='ñ';
