001d50  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001d54  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1262
001d58  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;1262
001d5a  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;1262
001d5c  d303              BCC      |L1.7526|
001d5e  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;1262
001d62  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1262
                  |L1.7526|
001d66  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1263
001d6a  488c              LDR      r0,|L1.8092|
001d6c  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1263
001d6e  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;1263
001d72  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1263
001d74  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001d78  e49b              B        |L1.5810|
                  |L1.7546|
001d7a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1316
001d7e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1316
001d80  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1316
001d84  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1317
001d88  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1317
001d8a  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1317
001d8e  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1318
001d92  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1318
001d94  f80b8000          STRB     r8,[r11,r0]           ;1318
001d98  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1319
001d9c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1319
001d9e  f80b7001          STRB     r7,[r11,r1]           ;1319
001da2  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1320
001da6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1320
001da8  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1320
001dac  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1321
001db0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1321
001db2  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1321
001db6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1322
001dba  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1322
001dbc  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1322
001dc0  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]           ;1323
001dc4  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;1324
001dc8  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1324
001dcc  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1324
001dd0  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001dd4  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;1325
001dd8  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1325
001dda  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1325
001ddc  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001de0  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1326
001de4  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;1326
001de6  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;1326
001de8  d303              BCC      |L1.7666|
001dea  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;1326
001dee  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1326
                  |L1.7666|
001df2  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1327
001df6  4869              LDR      r0,|L1.8092|
001df8  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1327
001dfa  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;1327
001dfe  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1327
001e00  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001e04  e455              B        |L1.5810|
;;;1332   
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;1365   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1366   void community2lcd(char* in,
001e06  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1367   			char xy,
;;;1368   			char flash_pos,
;;;1369   			char flash_on)
;;;1370   {
001e08  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001e0a  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001e0c  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001e0e  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1371   char temp;
;;;1372   char i;
;;;1373   //char n;
;;;1374   
;;;1375   
;;;1376   i=find(xy);
001e10  f7fffffe          BL       find
001e14  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;1377   
;;;1378   //in1=192;
;;;1379   
;;;1380   //in2=34;
;;;1381   
;;;1382   
;;;1383   
;;;1384   temp=i;
001e16  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;1385   
;;;1386   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1387   if(temp!=255)
;;;1388   while (*in)
;;;1389   	{
;;;1390   	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
001e18  4d61              LDR      r5,|L1.8096|
001e1a  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;1387
001e1c  d106              BNE      |L1.7724|
001e1e  e008              B        |L1.7730|
                  |L1.7712|
001e20  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
001e22  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;1391   	temp++;
001e26  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001e2a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.7724|
001e2c  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1388
001e2e  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1388
001e30  d1f6              BNE      |L1.7712|
                  |L1.7730|
;;;1392       	}
;;;1393   
;;;1394   
;;;1395   
;;;1396   if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
001e32  485c              LDR      r0,|L1.8100|
001e34  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
001e36  2800              CMP      r0,#0
001e38  d006              BEQ      |L1.7752|
001e3a  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
001e3c  d004              BEQ      |L1.7752|
;;;1397   	{
;;;1398   	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
001e3e  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
001e42  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
001e46  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.7752|
;;;1399   	}
;;;1400   
;;;1401   }
001e48  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1402   
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;1464   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1465   void ip2lcd(	short in1,
001e4a  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;1466   			short in2,
;;;1467   			short in3,
;;;1468   			short in4,
;;;1469   			char xy,
;;;1470   			char flash_pos)
;;;1471   {
001e4e  4607              MOV      r7,r0
001e50  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
001e54  4688              MOV      r8,r1
001e56  4691              MOV      r9,r2
001e58  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;1472   char i;
;;;1473   //char n;
;;;1474   
;;;1475   //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;1476   //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;1477   i=find(xy);
001e5a  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1478   
;;;1479   //in1=192;
;;;1480   
;;;1481   //in2=34;
;;;1482   
;;;1483   if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
001e5e  4b51              LDR      r3,|L1.8100|
;;;1484   	{
;;;1485   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
001e60  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
001e62  4c4f              LDR      r4,|L1.8096|
;;;1486   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;1487   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;1488   	}
;;;1489   else 
;;;1490   	{
;;;1491   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
001e64  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;1492   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;1493   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
001e66  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
001e6a  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;1483
001e6c  d109              BNE      |L1.7810|
001e6e  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;1483  ; bFL2
001e70  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7810|
001e72  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1485
001e76  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;1485
001e7a  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;1485
001e7c  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;1486
001e7e  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;1487
001e80  e017              B        |L1.7858|
                  |L1.7810|
001e82  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;1491
001e86  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;1491
001e8a  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1491
001e8e  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;1491
001e92  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;1491
001e96  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;1492
001e9a  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;1492
001e9e  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;1492
001ea2  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;1492
001ea6  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
001eaa  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001eae  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.7858|
;;;1494   	}
;;;1495   
;;;1496   if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
001eb2  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
001eb4  d109              BNE      |L1.7882|
001eb6  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001eb8  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7882|
;;;1497   	{
;;;1498   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
001eba  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001ebe  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001ec2  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1499   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
001ec4  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1500   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
001ec6  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001ec8  e017              B        |L1.7930|
                  |L1.7882|
;;;1501   	}
;;;1502   else 
;;;1503   	{
;;;1504   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
001eca  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
001ece  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
001ed2  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001ed6  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001eda  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
001ede  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;1505   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
001ee2  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
001ee6  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
001eea  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001eee  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1506   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
001ef0  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
001ef4  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001ef8  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.7930|
;;;1507   	}
;;;1508   
;;;1509   if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
001efa  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
001efc  d109              BNE      |L1.7954|
001efe  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001f00  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7954|
;;;1510   	{
;;;1511   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
001f02  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001f06  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001f0a  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1512   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
001f0c  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1513   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
001f0e  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001f10  e017              B        |L1.8002|
                  |L1.7954|
;;;1514   	}
;;;1515   else 
;;;1516   	{
;;;1517   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
001f12  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
001f16  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
001f1a  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001f1e  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001f22  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
001f26  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1518   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
001f2a  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
001f2e  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
001f32  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001f36  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1519   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
001f38  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
001f3c  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001f40  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.8002|
;;;1520   	}
;;;1521   
;;;1522   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
001f42  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
001f44  d109              BNE      |L1.8026|
001f46  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001f48  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.8026|
;;;1523   	{
;;;1524   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
001f4a  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1525   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
001f4c  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
001f4e  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
001f52  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1526   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
001f54  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.8022|
;;;1527   	}
;;;1528   else 
;;;1529   	{
;;;1530   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1531   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1532   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1533   	}
;;;1534   }
001f56  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.8026|
001f5a  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1530
001f5e  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1530
001f62  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30           ;1530
001f66  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1530
001f68  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1531
001f6c  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1531
001f70  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1531
001f72  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1531
001f76  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1531
001f7a  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1531
001f7c  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1532
001f80  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1532
001f84  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1532
001f86  e7e6              B        |L1.8022|
;;;1535   
                          ENDP

                  checkboxing PROC
;;;1536   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1537   void checkboxing(char xy,short in)
001f88  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1538   {
001f8a  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;1539   char i;
;;;1540   i=find(xy);
001f8c  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1541   if(in)lcd_buffer[i]=3;
001f90  4903              LDR      r1,|L1.8096|
001f92  b14c              CBZ      r4,|L1.8104|
001f94  f04f0203          MOV      r2,#3
001f98  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
                  |L1.8090|
;;;1542   else lcd_buffer[i]=4;	 
;;;1543   }
001f9a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L1.8092|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.8096|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.8100|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.8104|
001fa8  f04f0204          MOV      r2,#4                 ;1542
001fac  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]            ;1542
001fae  e7f4              B        |L1.8090|
;;;1544   
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1575   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1576   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
001fb0  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1577   {
;;;1578   char i;
;;;1579   char n;
;;;1580   
;;;1581   i=(20*y)+x;
001fb2  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
001fb6  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
001fba  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1582   
;;;1583   n=*((char*)&in);
001fbc  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1584   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001fc0  48d8              LDR      r0,|L1.8996|
001fc2  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
001fc6  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
001fc8  49d7              LDR      r1,|L1.9000|
001fca  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1585   i--;
001fcc  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001fd0  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1586   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001fd2  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001fd6  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001fd8  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1587   i--;
001fda  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001fde  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1588   
;;;1589   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
001fe0  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1590   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001fe4  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001fe8  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001fea  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1591   i--;
001fec  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001ff0  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1592   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001ff2  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001ff6  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001ff8  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1593   i--;
001ffa  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001ffe  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1594   
;;;1595   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
002000  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1596   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
002004  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
002008  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
00200a  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1597   i--;
00200c  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
002010  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1598   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
002012  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
002016  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
002018  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1599   i--;
00201a  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00201e  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1600   
;;;1601   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
002020  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1602   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
002024  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
002028  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
00202a  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1603   i--;
00202c  f1a30301          SUB      r3,r3,#1
002030  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1604   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
002032  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
002036  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
002038  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1605   i--;
;;;1606   }
00203a  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1607   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1621   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1622   void char2lcdhyx(char in,char y,char x)
00203c  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1623   {
;;;1624   char i;
;;;1625   
;;;1626   i=(20*y)+x;
00203e  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
002042  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
002046  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1627   
;;;1628   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
002048  4ab6              LDR      r2,|L1.8996|
00204a  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
00204e  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
002050  4bb5              LDR      r3,|L1.9000|
002052  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
;;;1629   i--;
002054  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
002058  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1630   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in/16];
00205a  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
00205e  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
002060  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
;;;1631   i--;
;;;1632   }
002062  e79a              B        |L1.8090|
;;;1633   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1679   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1680   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
002064  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1681   {
;;;1682   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
002066  49b1              LDR      r1,|L1.9004|
002068  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
00206a  4baf              LDR      r3,|L1.9000|
00206c  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
002070  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
002074  428a              CMP      r2,r1
002076  d104              BNE      |L1.8322|
002078  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
00207c  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1683   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1684   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1685   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1686   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1687   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1688   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1689   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1690   }
002080  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8322|
002082  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1683
002084  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1683
002086  d106              BNE      |L1.8342|
002088  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1683
00208c  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1683
002090  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1683
002094  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8342|
002096  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1684
002098  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1684
00209a  d106              BNE      |L1.8362|
00209c  f1000002          ADD      r0,r0,#2              ;1684
0020a0  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1684
0020a4  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1684
0020a8  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8362|
0020aa  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1685
0020ac  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1685
0020ae  d106              BNE      |L1.8382|
0020b0  f1000003          ADD      r0,r0,#3              ;1685
0020b4  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1685
0020b8  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1685
0020bc  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8382|
0020be  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1686
0020c0  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1686
0020c2  d106              BNE      |L1.8402|
0020c4  f1000004          ADD      r0,r0,#4              ;1686
0020c8  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1686
0020cc  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1686
0020d0  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8402|
0020d2  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1687
0020d4  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1687
0020d6  d106              BNE      |L1.8422|
0020d8  f1000005          ADD      r0,r0,#5              ;1687
0020dc  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1687
0020e0  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1687
0020e4  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8422|
0020e6  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1688
0020e8  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1688
0020ea  d106              BNE      |L1.8442|
0020ec  f1000006          ADD      r0,r0,#6              ;1688
0020f0  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1688
0020f4  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1688
                  |L1.8440|
0020f8  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8442|
0020fa  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1689
0020fc  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1689
0020fe  d1fb              BNE      |L1.8440|
002100  f1000007          ADD      r0,r0,#7              ;1689
002104  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1689
002108  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1689
00210c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1691   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1693   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1694   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
00210e  4b88              LDR      r3,|L1.9008|
;;;1695   {
;;;1696   ind_pointer--;
002110  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002112  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
002116  b212              SXTH     r2,r2
002118  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
;;;1697   if(ind_pointer<=0)ind_pointer=0;
00211a  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
00211c  dc02              BGT      |L1.8484|
00211e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002122  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
                  |L1.8484|
;;;1698   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
002124  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002126  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
002128  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
00212a  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1699   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
00212c  4a81              LDR      r2,|L1.9012|
00212e  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
002132  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
002134  487d              LDR      r0,|L1.9004|
002136  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
002138  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
00213a  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
00213c  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1700   
;;;1701   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
00213e  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
002140  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
002142  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1702   }
002144  4770              BX       lr
;;;1703   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1704   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1705   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
002146  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1706   {
;;;1707   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
002148  4d79              LDR      r5,|L1.9008|
00214a  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
00214e  f1040601          ADD      r6,r4,#1
002152  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
002154  4d77              LDR      r5,|L1.9012|
002156  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
00215a  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
00215c  4c73              LDR      r4,|L1.9004|
00215e  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
002160  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
002162  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
002164  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1708   ind=(i_enum)tind;
002166  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1709   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
002168  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1710   index_set=tindex_set;
00216a  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1711   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
00216c  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1712   }
00216e  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1713   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1714   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1715   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
002170  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1716   {
002174  4680              MOV      r8,r0
002176  460f              MOV      r7,r1
002178  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1717   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1718   clr_scrn();
00217a  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1719   
;;;1720   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
00217e  4c6a              LDR      r4,|L1.9000|
;;;1721   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
002180  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
                  |L1.8580|
;;;1722   	{
;;;1723   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
002184  f8180b01          LDRB     r0,[r8],#1
002188  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
00218c  f1050501          ADD      r5,r5,#1              ;1721
002190  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1721
002192  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1721
002194  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8580|
;;;1724   	}
;;;1725   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
002196  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8602|
;;;1726   	{
;;;1727   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
00219a  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
00219e  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
0021a2  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1725
0021a6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1725
0021a8  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1725
0021aa  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8602|
;;;1728   	}
;;;1729   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
0021ac  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8624|
;;;1730   	{
;;;1731   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
0021b0  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
0021b4  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
0021b8  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1729
0021bc  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1729
0021be  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1729
0021c0  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8624|
;;;1732   	}
;;;1733   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
0021c2  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8646|
;;;1734   	{
;;;1735   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
0021c6  f8131b01          LDRB     r1,[r3],#1
0021ca  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
0021ce  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1733
0021d2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1733
0021d4  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1733
0021d6  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8646|
;;;1736   	}
;;;1737   
;;;1738   
;;;1739   }
0021d8  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1740   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1756   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1757   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
0021dc  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1758   {
0021de  9c03              LDR      r4,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1759   //bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
;;;1760   //tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
;;;1761   //ret((char)(m_sec/100));
;;;1762   show_mess_cnt=(char)(m_sec/100);
0021e0  f04f0564          MOV      r5,#0x64
0021e4  fb94f4f5          SDIV     r4,r4,r5
0021e8  4d53              LDR      r5,|L1.9016|
0021ea  702c              STRB     r4,[r5,#0]
;;;1763   show_mess_p1=p1;
0021ec  4c53              LDR      r4,|L1.9020|
0021ee  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
;;;1764   show_mess_p2=p2;
0021f0  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.9024|
0021f2  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
;;;1765   show_mess_p3=p3;
0021f4  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.9028|
0021f6  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
;;;1766   show_mess_p4=p4;
0021f8  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.9032|
0021fa  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
;;;1767   }
0021fc  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1768   //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1795   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1796   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
0021fe  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1797   {
002202  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1798   char iii;
;;;1799   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1800   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1801   		
;;;1802   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1803   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1804   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1805   tempii*=32;
002204  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;1806   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
002208  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
00220c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1807        
;;;1808   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
00220e  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
002210  4620              MOV      r0,r4
002212  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1809   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
002216  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
002218  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
00221c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1810   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
002220  4669              MOV      r1,sp
002222  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
002226  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1811   
;;;1812   iii=find(simbol);
00222a  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00222c  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1813   
;;;1814   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
002230  4c3d              LDR      r4,|L1.9000|
002232  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
002236  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00223a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00223c  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1815   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00223e  f04f0730          MOV      r7,#0x30
002242  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002246  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002248  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1816   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
00224a  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
00224e  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
002252  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
002254  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1817   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
002258  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
00225c  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002260  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002262  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1818   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
002266  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00226a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00226c  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1819   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
00226e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002272  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002274  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1820   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002276  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00227a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00227c  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1821   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
00227e  f04f0223          MOV      r2,#0x23
002282  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002286  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
002288  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1822   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
00228a  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
00228e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002292  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
002296  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1823   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
00229a  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
00229e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0022a0  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
0022a2  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1824   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
0022a6  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
0022aa  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0022ac  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
0022ae  d303              BCC      |L1.8888|
0022b0  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
0022b4  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.8888|
;;;1825   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0); 
0022b8  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
0022bc  4923              LDR      r1,|L1.9036|
0022be  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0022c0  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
0022c4  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
0022c6  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1826   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
0022ca  f1050001          ADD      r0,r5,#1
0022ce  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0022d0  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1827   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0022d2  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0022d6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0022d8  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1828   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
0022da  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0022de  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0022e0  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1829   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
0022e4  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a
0022e8  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0022ec  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0022ee  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1830   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0022f0  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0022f4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0022f6  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1831   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
0022f8  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0022fc  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
0022fe  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1832   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
002302  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
002306  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
00230a  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
00230e  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1833   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
002312  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
002316  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002318  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00231a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1834      		     		
;;;1835   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
00231e  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1836   }	
002320  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
                          ENDP

                  |L1.8996|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.9000|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.9004|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.9008|
                          DCD      ind_pointer
                  |L1.9012|
                          DCD      b_ind
                  |L1.9016|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L1.9020|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L1.9024|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L1.9028|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L1.9032|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L1.9036|
                          DCD      sm_mont

                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.2||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000004  4614              MOV      r4,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da04              BGE      |L2.20|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  ea6f0000          MVN      r0,r0
00000e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000012  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L2.20|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000028  d022              BEQ      |L2.112|
00002a  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002e  4d12              LDR      r5,|L2.120|
000030  4a12              LDR      r2,|L2.124|
                  |L2.50|
000032  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
000034  d202              BCS      |L2.60|
000036  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000038  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
00003a  e011              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.60|
00003c  d108              BNE      |L2.80|
00003e  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000042  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000044  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000048  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00004a  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
00004e  e007              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.80|
000050  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000052  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000054  d004              BEQ      |L2.96|
000056  b164              CBZ      r4,|L2.114|
000058  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
00005c  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L2.96|
000060  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000064  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000066  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00006a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00006c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00006e  d3e0              BCC      |L2.50|
                  |L2.112|
000070  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L2.114|
000072  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000074  e7f4              B        |L2.96|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.120|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.124|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.3||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.3||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000004  4615              MOV      r5,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da02              BGE      |L3.16|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
00000e  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L3.16|
000010  f04f062d          MOV      r6,#0x2d
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002a  4a1a              LDR      r2,|L3.148|
00002c  4c1a              LDR      r4,|L3.152|
                  |L3.46|
00002e  b97d              CBNZ     r5,|L3.80|
000030  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000032  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000034  d00c              BEQ      |L3.80|
000036  1857              ADDS     r7,r2,r1
000038  787f              LDRB     r7,[r7,#1]
00003a  2f20              CMP      r7,#0x20
00003c  d106              BNE      |L3.76|
00003e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
000040  d104              BNE      |L3.76|
000042  eb040c00          ADD      r12,r4,r0
000046  4637              MOV      r7,r6
000048  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L3.76|
00004c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00004e  e017              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.80|
000050  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
000052  d202              BCS      |L3.90|
000054  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000056  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000058  e012              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.90|
00005a  d108              BNE      |L3.110|
00005c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000060  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000062  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000066  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000068  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00006c  e008              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.110|
00006e  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000070  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000072  d004              BEQ      |L3.126|
000074  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000078  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00007c  e000              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.126|
00007e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
                  |L3.128|
000080  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000084  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000086  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00008a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00008c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00008e  d3ce              BCC      |L3.46|
000090  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000092  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.148|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L3.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.4||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.4||, ||.text||
                  serial2lcd PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000004  4684              MOV      r12,r0
000006  f8dd9028          LDR      r9,[sp,#0x28]
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4617              MOV      r7,r2
00000c  4698              MOV      r8,r3
00000e  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
000012  f04f050a          MOV      r5,#0xa
000016  466e              MOV      r6,sp
                  |L4.24|
000018  fbbcf4f5          UDIV     r4,r12,r5
00001c  fb05c214          MLS      r2,r5,r4,r12
000020  5432              STRB     r2,[r6,r0]
000022  46a4              MOV      r12,r4
000024  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000028  b240              SXTB     r0,r0
00002a  280a              CMP      r0,#0xa
00002c  dbf4              BLT      |L4.24|
00002e  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000030  f7fffffe          BL       find
000034  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
000038  4b0d              LDR      r3,|L4.112|
00003a  e008              B        |L4.78|
                  |L4.60|
00003c  5c72              LDRB     r2,[r6,r1]
00003e  eba00401          SUB      r4,r0,r1
000042  f1020230          ADD      r2,r2,#0x30
000046  551a              STRB     r2,[r3,r4]
000048  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00004c  b249              SXTB     r1,r1
                  |L4.78|
00004e  42b9              CMP      r1,r7
000050  dbf4              BLT      |L4.60|
000052  4908              LDR      r1,|L4.116|
000054  7809              LDRB     r1,[r1,#0]  ; bFL2
000056  2900              CMP      r1,#0
000058  d007              BEQ      |L4.106|
00005a  f1b90f00          CMP      r9,#0
00005e  d004              BEQ      |L4.106|
000060  eba00008          SUB      r0,r0,r8
000064  f04f015f          MOV      r1,#0x5f
000068  5419              STRB     r1,[r3,r0]
                  |L4.106|
00006a  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

00006e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.112|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L4.116|
                          DCD      bFL2

                          AREA ||area_number.5||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.5||, ||.text||
                  power_inc PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
000006  b191              CBZ      r1,|L5.46|
000008  2901              CMP      r1,#1
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  d013              BEQ      |L5.52|
00000c  2902              CMP      r1,#2
00000e  d014              BEQ      |L5.58|
000010  2903              CMP      r1,#3
000012  d015              BEQ      |L5.64|
000014  2904              CMP      r1,#4
000016  d016              BEQ      |L5.70|
000018  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00001a  d017              BEQ      |L5.76|
00001c  2906              CMP      r1,#6
00001e  d017              BEQ      |L5.80|
000020  2907              CMP      r1,#7
000022  d017              BEQ      |L5.84|
000024  2908              CMP      r1,#8
000026  d017              BEQ      |L5.88|
000028  2909              CMP      r1,#9
00002a  d017              BEQ      |L5.92|
00002c  e017              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.46|
00002e  f04f0201          MOV      r2,#1
000032  e014              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.52|
000034  f04f020a          MOV      r2,#0xa
000038  e011              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.58|
00003a  f04f0264          MOV      r2,#0x64
00003e  e00e              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.64|
000040  f44f727a          MOV      r2,#0x3e8
000044  e00b              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.70|
000046  f2427210          MOV      r2,#0x2710
00004a  e008              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.76|
00004c  4a13              LDR      r2,|L5.156|
00004e  e006              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.80|
000050  4a13              LDR      r2,|L5.160|
000052  e004              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.84|
000054  4a13              LDR      r2,|L5.164|
000056  e002              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.88|
000058  4a13              LDR      r2,|L5.168|
00005a  e000              B        |L5.94|
                  |L5.92|
00005c  4a13              LDR      r2,|L5.172|
                  |L5.94|
00005e  eb020182          ADD      r1,r2,r2,LSL #2
000062  ea4f0441          LSL      r4,r1,#1
000066  f04f030a          MOV      r3,#0xa
00006a  fbb0f1f2          UDIV     r1,r0,r2
00006e  fb020511          MLS      r5,r2,r1,r0
000072  fbb0f4f4          UDIV     r4,r0,r4
000076  fbb1f0f3          UDIV     r0,r1,r3
00007a  fb031010          MLS      r0,r3,r0,r1
00007e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000082  fbb0f1f3          UDIV     r1,r0,r3
000086  fb030111          MLS      r1,r3,r1,r0
00008a  eb040084          ADD      r0,r4,r4,LSL #2
00008e  ea4f0040          LSL      r0,r0,#1
000092  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
000094  fb00f002          MUL      r0,r0,r2
000098  4428              ADD      r0,r0,r5
00009a  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L5.156|
                          DCD      0x000186a0
                  |L5.160|
                          DCD      0x000f4240
                  |L5.164|
                          DCD      0x00989680
                  |L5.168|
                          DCD      0x05f5e100
                  |L5.172|
                          DCD      0x3b9aca00

                          AREA ||area_number.6||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.6||, ||.text||
                  power_dec PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
000006  b191              CBZ      r1,|L6.46|
000008  2901              CMP      r1,#1
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  d013              BEQ      |L6.52|
00000c  2902              CMP      r1,#2
00000e  d014              BEQ      |L6.58|
000010  2903              CMP      r1,#3
000012  d015              BEQ      |L6.64|
000014  2904              CMP      r1,#4
000016  d016              BEQ      |L6.70|
000018  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00001a  d017              BEQ      |L6.76|
00001c  2906              CMP      r1,#6
00001e  d017              BEQ      |L6.80|
000020  2907              CMP      r1,#7
000022  d017              BEQ      |L6.84|
000024  2908              CMP      r1,#8
000026  d017              BEQ      |L6.88|
000028  2909              CMP      r1,#9
00002a  d017              BEQ      |L6.92|
00002c  e017              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.46|
00002e  f04f0201          MOV      r2,#1
000032  e014              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.52|
000034  f04f020a          MOV      r2,#0xa
000038  e011              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.58|
00003a  f04f0264          MOV      r2,#0x64
00003e  e00e              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.64|
000040  f44f727a          MOV      r2,#0x3e8
000044  e00b              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.70|
000046  f2427210          MOV      r2,#0x2710
00004a  e008              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.76|
00004c  4a13              LDR      r2,|L6.156|
00004e  e006              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.80|
000050  4a13              LDR      r2,|L6.160|
000052  e004              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.84|
000054  4a13              LDR      r2,|L6.164|
000056  e002              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.88|
000058  4a13              LDR      r2,|L6.168|
00005a  e000              B        |L6.94|
                  |L6.92|
00005c  4a13              LDR      r2,|L6.172|
                  |L6.94|
00005e  eb020182          ADD      r1,r2,r2,LSL #2
000062  ea4f0341          LSL      r3,r1,#1
000066  f04f040a          MOV      r4,#0xa
00006a  fbb0f1f2          UDIV     r1,r0,r2
00006e  fb020511          MLS      r5,r2,r1,r0
000072  fbb0f3f3          UDIV     r3,r0,r3
000076  fbb1f0f4          UDIV     r0,r1,r4
00007a  fb041010          MLS      r0,r4,r0,r1
00007e  b150              CBZ      r0,|L6.150|
000080  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
                  |L6.132|
000084  eb030183          ADD      r1,r3,r3,LSL #2
000088  ea4f0141          LSL      r1,r1,#1
00008c  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
00008e  fb00f002          MUL      r0,r0,r2
000092  4428              ADD      r0,r0,r5
000094  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L6.150|
000096  f04f0009          MOV      r0,#9
00009a  e7f3              B        |L6.132|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.156|
                          DCD      0x000186a0
                  |L6.160|
                          DCD      0x000f4240
                  |L6.164|
                          DCD      0x00989680
                  |L6.168|
                          DCD      0x05f5e100
                  |L6.172|

                          AREA ||area_number.7||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.7||, ||.text||
                  place2lcd PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  4616              MOV      r6,r2
000008  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  f7fffffe          BL       find
00000e  4602              MOV      r2,r0
000010  4610              MOV      r0,r2
000012  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
000016  4b0e              LDR      r3,|L7.80|
000018  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
00001a  d109              BNE      |L7.48|
00001c  e00c              B        |L7.56|
                  |L7.30|
00001e  541d              STRB     r5,[r3,r0]
000020  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
000024  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000028  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00002a  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00002e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
                  |L7.48|
000030  7825              LDRB     r5,[r4,#0]
000032  b10d              CBZ      r5,|L7.56|
000034  2913              CMP      r1,#0x13
000036  d3f2              BCC      |L7.30|
                  |L7.56|
000038  4806              LDR      r0,|L7.84|
00003a  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
00003c  2800              CMP      r0,#0
00003e  d006              BEQ      |L7.78|
000040  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
000042  d004              BEQ      |L7.78|
000044  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
000048  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
00004c  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
                  |L7.78|
00004e  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L7.80|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L7.84|
                          DCD      bFL2

                          AREA ||area_number.8||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.8||, ||.text||
                  data2lcd PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000008  4690              MOV      r8,r2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4618              MOV      r0,r3
00000c  9c08              LDR      r4,[sp,#0x20]
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       find
000012  f8df90c8          LDR      r9,|L8.220|
000016  2220              MOVS     r2,#0x20
000018  250a              MOVS     r5,#0xa
00001a  f8dfc0c4          LDR      r12,|L8.224|
00001e  2c01              CMP      r4,#1
000020  d108              BNE      |L8.52|
000022  f8991000          LDRB     r1,[r9,#0]  ; bFL2
000026  b129              CBZ      r1,|L8.52|
000028  eb0c0100          ADD      r1,r12,r0
00002c  f8012d09          STRB     r2,[r1,#-9]!
000030  704a              STRB     r2,[r1,#1]
000032  e00d              B        |L8.80|
                  |L8.52|
000034  fb96f3f5          SDIV     r3,r6,r5
000038  eb0c0100          ADD      r1,r12,r0
00003c  f1030a30          ADD      r10,r3,#0x30
000040  f801ac09          STRB     r10,[r1,#-9]
000044  fb056313          MLS      r3,r5,r3,r6
000048  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30
00004c  f8013c08          STRB     r3,[r1,#-8]
                  |L8.80|
000050  eb0c0300          ADD      r3,r12,r0
000054  f04f012f          MOV      r1,#0x2f
000058  f8031c07          STRB     r1,[r3,#-7]
00005c  2c02              CMP      r4,#2
00005e  d107              BNE      |L8.112|
000060  f8996000          LDRB     r6,[r9,#0]  ; bFL2
000064  b126              CBZ      r6,|L8.112|
000066  f8032c06          STRB     r2,[r3,#-6]
00006a  f8032c05          STRB     r2,[r3,#-5]
00006e  e00b              B        |L8.136|
                  |L8.112|
000070  fb97f6f5          SDIV     r6,r7,r5
000074  f1060a30          ADD      r10,r6,#0x30
000078  f803ac06          STRB     r10,[r3,#-6]
00007c  fb057616          MLS      r6,r5,r6,r7
000080  f1060630          ADD      r6,r6,#0x30
000084  f8036c05          STRB     r6,[r3,#-5]
                  |L8.136|
000088  f8031c04          STRB     r1,[r3,#-4]
00008c  2c03              CMP      r4,#3
00008e  d10a              BNE      |L8.166|
000090  f8991000          LDRB     r1,[r9,#0]  ; bFL2
000094  b139              CBZ      r1,|L8.166|
000096  f8032d03          STRB     r2,[r3,#-3]!
00009a  705a              STRB     r2,[r3,#1]
00009c  709a              STRB     r2,[r3,#2]
00009e  f80c2000          STRB     r2,[r12,r0]
                  |L8.162|
0000a2  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
                  |L8.166|
0000a6  f04f0132          MOV      r1,#0x32
0000aa  f8031d03          STRB     r1,[r3,#-3]!
0000ae  f04f0130          MOV      r1,#0x30
0000b2  7059              STRB     r1,[r3,#1]
0000b4  f04f0164          MOV      r1,#0x64
0000b8  fb98f2f1          SDIV     r2,r8,r1
0000bc  fb018112          MLS      r1,r1,r2,r8
0000c0  fb91f1f5          SDIV     r1,r1,r5
0000c4  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30
0000c8  7099              STRB     r1,[r3,#2]
0000ca  fb98f1f5          SDIV     r1,r8,r5
0000ce  fb058111          MLS      r1,r5,r1,r8
0000d2  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30
0000d6  f80c1000          STRB     r1,[r12,r0]
0000da  e7e2              B        |L8.162|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L8.220|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L8.224|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.9||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.9||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4a07              LDR      r2,|L9.40|
00000c  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000010  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000012  4906              LDR      r1,|L9.44|
000014  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000016  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
000020  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
000022  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000024  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L9.40|

                  |L9.44|

                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4b0f              LDR      r3,|L10.76|
00000e  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
000012  4c0f              LDR      r4,|L10.80|
000014  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000016  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  ea4f1210          LSR      r2,r0,#4
000022  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
000026  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
000028  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
00002a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00002e  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000030  ea4f1112          LSR      r1,r2,#4
000034  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
000038  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
00003a  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
00003c  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000040  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000042  ea4f1111          LSR      r1,r1,#4
000046  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
000048  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00004a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L10.76|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L10.80|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
00000c  4921              LDR      r1,|L11.148|
00000e  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
000012  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
000014  f1a40201          SUB      r2,r4,#1
000018  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
00001a  4a1f              LDR      r2,|L11.152|
00001c  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
00001e  ea4f0450          LSR      r4,r0,#1
000022  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
000026  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000028  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
00002c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00002e  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000030  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000034  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
000038  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00003a  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
00003e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000040  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000042  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000046  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00004a  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00004c  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000050  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000052  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000054  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000058  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00005c  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00005e  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
000062  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000064  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000066  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
00006a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00006e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000070  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000074  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000076  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000078  ea4f0354          LSR      r3,r4,#1
00007c  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
000080  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
000082  f1a00401          SUB      r4,r0,#1
000086  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000088  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
00008a  ea4f0053          LSR      r0,r3,#1
00008e  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000090  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
000092  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L11.148|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L11.152|

                          AREA ||area_number.12||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.12||, ||.text||
                  show_mess_number PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  e9dd4606          LDRD     r4,r6,[sp,#0x18]
000006  9d05              LDR      r5,[sp,#0x14]
000008  f04f0764          MOV      r7,#0x64
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000c  fb95f5f7          SDIV     r5,r5,r7
000010  4f07              LDR      r7,|L12.48|
000012  703d              STRB     r5,[r7,#0]
000014  4d07              LDR      r5,|L12.52|
000016  6028              STR      r0,[r5,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
000018  4807              LDR      r0,|L12.56|
00001a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
00001c  4807              LDR      r0,|L12.60|
00001e  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
000020  4807              LDR      r0,|L12.64|
000022  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
000024  4807              LDR      r0,|L12.68|
000026  8004              STRH     r4,[r0,#0]
000028  4807              LDR      r0,|L12.72|
00002a  7006              STRB     r6,[r0,#0]
00002c  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

00002e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L12.48|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L12.52|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L12.56|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L12.60|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L12.64|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L12.68|
                          DCD      show_mess_number_
                  |L12.72|
                          DCD      show_mess_komma
